description: Enhanced software with Ruby on Rails and ReactJS, reducing downtime by 30%. Delivered full-stack features on tight deadlines. Improved code quality and user experience, reducing bugs by 20%.
Mentored 2 junior developers, reviewed code for consistency and performance, and proposed improvements, boosting efficiency by 15% and achieving 100% retention rate.

Developed responsive front-end designs for 3 web apps, ensuring cross-browser compatibility. Optimized load times by 26% through minification and image compression. Collaborated with 5 team members to develop a key feature using agile practices.
